attributes.action: Enquiry into the BBC and revoke the licence fee due to left wing bias broadcasts
attributes.additional_details: The BBC to also be accountable for pressing bias left wing politics onto the public who pay the licence fee when in fact to fully represent the fee paying public should remain unbiased  at all times. To revoke the licence fee as the aforementioned political bias is not shared by the majority of the public and the BBC are not performing a public service to the majority of people they are taking money from under the false pretenses of public representation.
attributes.background: Enquiry into the BBC.  Who as a public funded service should show balanced views at all times and not ignore the public views and show bias left wing opinions all the time.
